ON Semiconductorwww.onsemi.comOverview
[GRI: 102-7]  [GRI: 405-1]  
We believe our company’s mission, vision, values and culture afford opportunities for everyone to make a difference in building a successful 
global business. We are constantly striving toward a more diverse workforce that benefits our company and enables us to meet the needs 
of our customers, suppliers, employees and shareholders worldwide. 
Our community of employees are located around the world with major facilities in the U.S., Belgium, Canada, France, Ireland, Slovak 
Republic, Czech Republic, Japan, Korea, China, Malaysia, Vietnam and the Philippines. As of December 2019, we had approximately 35,000 
employees operating globally.OUR PEOPLE
